code: @Test public void loginShouldHaveBothOAuthClientsToChooseFrom() {     byte[] body = this.webTestClient.get().uri("/login").exchange().expectStatus().isOk().returnResult(String.class).getResponseBodyContent().     String bodyString = new String(body).     assertThat(bodyString).contains("/oauth2/authorization/yahoo").     assertThat(bodyString).contains("/oauth2/authorization/github-client-1").     assertThat(bodyString).contains("/oauth2/authorization/github-client-2"). }
